content: Rock musician Stan Bush has just completed a new music video for his classic anthem "The Touch" as an uplifting tribute to the men and women who protect this country and our freedoms. He felt the lyrics to this classic song featured in the "Transformers" were very relevant to the positive and inspirational message of the mission of our Armed Forces. Mr. Bush hopes that soldiers, family, and friends alike enjoy this video: 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VV9khwxen14' MOD HAT ON There ya go. Fixed it for you. In the future, please remember to convert hot links to cold links unless they go to military.com, .gov, .mil or a Veteran's service organization such as the VFW or DAV. All other hot links are prohibited. To convert a hot link to a cold one, just add any character to both ends of the link, as I did above with the ' character. That'll do it. As for editing your own post? Vicdude is right. Just click on the file with an eraser tip on it and change or delete your post. One more word: Please read and follow the Terms of Service found at the bottom of any page. Welcome to military.com. Have a good time. By the way, that's an excellent video! This message has been edited. Last edited by: stillkit, Fri 13 March 2009 06:25 AM
